dropGroupingColumns.name: Drop grouping columns
dropGroupingColumns.value: Select checkbox to remove grouped columns from the output.

groupBy.name: Group By
groupBy.value: Specify the key column for the operation. To specify more than one key, use a comma or Enter.

aggregateFunctions.name: Aggregate functions
aggregateFunctions.value3: 2. In the drop-down lists that appear, specify the function and column name.
aggregateFunctions.value4: Available functions: Count, Avg, Min, Max, Sum, Mean.
aggregateFunctions.value6: 1. Use the Plus button to add as many columns as you need.
aggregateFunctions.value7: 2. Use the Minus button to remove the filter.
aggregateFunctions.value8: 3. Use the Upp Arrow and Down Arrow to change the order of columns.
